tool_description: An API shows all the latest climate change news around the world.
name: Climate Change Live_v3
title: Climate Change Live

api_list.name: Get Indivisual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about climate change from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live452.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live452.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live452.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live452.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back  all news about the climate change from all over world.
